pages.text: The infimove minecart is pretty much an improved version of a furnace minecart. Note however, that it is not required to power it at all. Just place green wool (or concrete) below a track to power it up, and red wool (or concrete) above the track to stop it. Think of it like programming on a 'while' loop or a 'for' loop. Or think of it like an inaccurate electricity model (jk).
Can be powered in a few ways.

In the 1.7.7 version of Thingamajigs, Infimove minecarts now like to 'trick' over ~3+ block gaps! They also can glide over 1 block gaps if going fast enough. Their physics are slightly better than normal minecarts, and can be walked upon now.
Not only this, but green and red block logic now is a little more based on cart direction. It may take some experimentation to get a system working with the changes.
